summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5124 for the improvement of 59th Avenue Southwest, from West Hanford Street to West Charlestown Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 59007, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
